sqlList.sqlElement: select A.id as id, A.user_id as userId, A.password as password, A.user_name as userName, A.real_name as realName, A.leaders_tel as leadersTel, A.mail_address as mailAddress, A.address as address, A.user_type as userType, A.remarks as remarks, A.control_confirm_flg as controlConfirmFlg, A.company_id as companyId, A.role_id as roleId, A.del_flg as delFlg, A.ins_user as insUser, A.ins_time as insTime, A.upd_user as updUser, A.upd_time as updTime, A.reserve_col_1 as reserveCol1, A.reserve_col_2 as reserveCol2, A.reserve_col_3 as reserveCol3, A.reserve_col_4 as reserveCol4, A.reserve_col_5 as reserveCol5, from dpc_user_tab A where 1 = 1 #if("$!id" != "") and A.id = :id #end #if("$!userId" != "") and A.user_id = :userId #end #if("$!password" != "") and A.password = :password #end #if("$!userName" != "") and A.user_name = :userName #end #if("$!realName" != "") and A.real_name = :realName #end #if("$!leadersTel" != "") and A.leaders_tel = :leadersTel #end #if("$!mailAddress" != "") and A.mail_address = :mailAddress #end #if("$!address" != "") and A.address = :address #end #if("$!userType" != "") and A.user_type = :userType #end #if("$!remarks" != "") and A.remarks = :remarks #end #if("$!controlConfirmFlg" != "") and A.control_confirm_flg = :controlConfirmFlg #end #if("$!companyId" != "") and A.company_id = :companyId #end #if("$!roleId" != "") and A.role_id = :roleId #end #if("$!delFlg" != "") and A.del_flg = :delFlg #end #if("$!insUser" != "") and A.ins_user = :insUser #end #if("$!insTime" != "") and A.ins_time = :insTime #end #if("$!updUser" != "") and A.upd_user = :updUser #end #if("$!updTime" != "") and A.upd_time = :updTime #end #if("$!reserveCol1" != "") and A.reserve_col_1 = :reserveCol1 #end #if("$!reserveCol2" != "") and A.reserve_col_2 = :reserveCol2 #end #if("$!reserveCol3" != "") and A.reserve_col_3 = :reserveCol3 #end #if("$!reserveCol4" != "") and A.reserve_col_4 = :reserveCol4 #end #if("$!reserveCol5" != "") and A.reserve_col_5 = :reserveCol5 #end
